00043 void MemMapFileTest::FilenameTest()
00044 {
00045         MemMapFile mmfile;
00046         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00047         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.GetFilename() == "fred_flintstone");
00048 }

00050 void MemMapFileTest::CreateTest()
00051 {
00052         MemMapFile mmfile;
00053         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00055         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00056 }

00058 void MemMapFileTest::OpenTest()
00059 {
00060         MemMapFile mmfile;
00061         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00065 }

00067 void MemMapFileTest::MapDataTest()
00068 {
00069         MemMapFile mmfile;
00070         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(0, 200));
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00075 }

00087 void MemMapFileTest::GetDataPtrTest()
00088 {
00089         MemMapFile mmfile;
00090         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(0, 200));
00094         char* ptr = mmfile.GetDataPtr();
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ptr != 0);
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00097 }

00099 void MemMapFileTest::GetFirstMappedBytePosTest()
00100 {
00101         MemMapFile mmfile;
00102         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(50, 150));
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.GetFirstMappedBytePos() == 50);
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00108 }

00110 void MemMapFileTest::GetBytesMappedTest()
00111 {
00112         MemMapFile mmfile;
00113         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(100, 200));
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.GetBytesMapped() == 100);
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00119 }

00121 void MemMapFileTest::GetLastErrorTest()
00122 {
00123         MemMapFile mmfile;
00124         std::wstring errorMsg = mmfile.GetLastError();
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(errorMsg.length() == 0); 
00126         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE) == false);
00128         errorMsg = mmfile.GetLastError();
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(errorMsg.length() > 0);
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00131 }
00132 
00133 void MemMapFileTest::IsViewMappedTest()
00134 {
00135         MemMapFile mmfile;
00136         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.IsViewMapped() == false);
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.IsViewMapped() == false);
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(0, 200));
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.IsViewMapped());
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00144 }

00148         MemMapFile mmfile;
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200) == false);
00150 }

00158 void MemMapFileTest::WriteValuesTest()
00159 {
00160         MemMapFile mmfile;
00161         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.IsViewMapped() == false);
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(0, 100));
00166         char* ptr = mmfile.GetDataPtr();
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ptr);
00168         *ptr = 'c';
00169         ptr++;
00170         *ptr = 's';
00171         // Re-map data
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(100, 100));
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(0, 200));
00174         // Check the value
00175         ptr = mmfile.GetDataPtr();
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*ptr == 'c');
00177         ++ptr;
00178         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*ptr == 's');
00179         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00180 }
